name: Preschool
description: Maternelle is a unique bilingual immersion environment beginning at age 2 for U.S. Grades: Pre-K (Age 2), Pre-K (Age 3), Pre-K (Age 4), and Kindergarten students. Initially, students benefit from classes that are conducted in French 80%-90% of the time.

whatTheyOffer: Maternelle is a unique bilingual immersion environment beginning at age 2 for U.S. Grades: Pre-K (Age 2), Pre-K (Age 3), Pre-K (Age 4), and Kindergarten students. Initially, students benefit from classes that are conducted in French 80%-90% of the time.
howToGetIt: Complete the application process by visiting their website admissions page.
cost: This is a fee based service.
